subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Niese allowed 11 hits and eight runs in five-plus innings, tying a career high for earned runs allowed, as St. Louis derailed the Mets’ three-game winning streak with a sudden deluge of offense.
snippet: Niese allowed 11 hits and eight runs in five-plus innings, tying a career high for earned runs allowed, as St. Louis derailed the Mets’ three-game winning streak with a sudden deluge of offense.
